body: You gain a +2 bonus on Will saves against enchantment spells or effects. At 7th level, you may reroll a failed Will save once per day as an immediate action. You must take the second result, even if it is worse.
name: Two Minds
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Oracle/Oracle Archetypes/Possessed Oracle/Revelations/Two Minds
